**[Nexim Web Hosting](https://neximweb.com/)** has recently launched Virtual Private Servers (VPS) product line. Nexim Web Hosting, run by Nexim LLC has been providing quality web hosting services since 2010 and is proud to expand its product line from Shared Hosting. To mark the launch of the new product line, we are offering 30% Recurring Discount on all of our products with the use of coupon code **LETNOV2014**.

About Us
----------
Nexim Web Hosting is operated by its parent company Nexim LLC which is registered in the state of Colorado. Nexim LLC has been providing web hosting, web application development, mobile development, web designing and other services to the local businesses of Boulder and Denver, Colorado since October 2010 and started providing web hosting services worldwide via Nexim Web Hosting starting last December.

We are committed to providing the best customer experience to our clients and we will do anything to make that happen. We provide hosting services for affordable prices while still making enough to be able to provide quality customer support.

Network and Servers
----------
All our servers are deployed with at least 64GB of ram and have latest Xeon E5 CPU's with at least 3.5ghz clock speed per core.

The servers are located in Beauharnois, QC, Canada at OVH's datacenter with 3TBps total network connectivity. All servers have a gigabit port and all VPSes get unmetered bandwidth sharing the port.

All servers come with advanced DDoS protection up to 480GBPS or 500 million packets per second.
